scripts.ptau:contrib: echo 'someEntropy' | snarkjs powersoftau contribute build/pot17_0000.ptau build/pot17_0001.ptau
scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/keystroke.r1cs build/pot17_0001.ptau build/keystroke.zkey
scripts.setup:contrib: echo 'someEntropy' | snarkjs zkey contribute build/keystroke.zkey build/keystroke_final.zkey
scripts.export:vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/keystroke_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove build/keystroke_final.zkey build/keystroke_js/keystroke.wasm build/input.json build/proof.json build/public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json build/public.json build/proof.json
